author: isaiah658
long_description:
# Zoonami 3D Mobs
A Minetest mod that changes the 2D monsters mobs in [Zoonami](https://content.minetest.net/packages/isaiah658/zoonami/) to be 3D. The 3D models are not animated.

## Updates
Information on updates can be found in the [CHANGELOG.md](https://codeberg.org/isaiah658/zoonami_3d_mobs/src/branch/main/CHANGELOG.md) file.

## Licensing
Licensing can be found in the [LICENSE.txt](https://codeberg.org/isaiah658/zoonami_3d_mobs/src/branch/main/LICENSE.txt) file.
name: zoonami_3d_mobs
title: Zoonami 3D Mobs
